page.title: 03Recent Changes in this area
page.content: {By A.Cornell} In the area of{Lincomb}several changes have taken place during recent years. For a start pheasants used to be kept in the woods to be shot as game but this proved uneconomical because of poachers,so they stopped doing it. The farmers around the Lincomb area used to keep dairy cows but in the last decade they decided to change to meat cows for finacial reasons,so the daires of Lincomb lie disused.On parts of the farmland of Lincomb private houses have been built.These houses are bought by people with quite a bit of money,the houses here are probably more exspensive because of the pretty area.People living here normally work quite a distance away,therefore giving little to the community.
